IORWLockWrite FunctionIORWLockWriteDriverKitiOSiPadOSmacOSvoid IORWLockWrite(struct IORWLock * lock); Parameters lockPointer to the allocated lock.

Lock a read/write lock for write.

Lock the lock for write, allowing one writer exlusive access. If the lock is held for read or write, block waiting for its unlock. Locking the lock recursively from one thread, for read or write, can result in deadlock.

# IORWLockWrite | Apple Developer Documentation

- [ DriverKit ](/documentation/driverkit)

- [ IORWLockWrite ](/documentation/driverkit/iorwlockwrite)

-  IORWLockWrite 

Function# IORWLockWrite

DriverKitiOSiPadOSmacOS

```
void IORWLockWrite(struct IORWLock * lock);
```

## [ Parameters ](/documentation/driverkit/iorwlockwrite#parameters)

`lock`Pointer to the allocated lock.

## [Discussion](/documentation/driverkit/iorwlockwrite#discussion)

Lock a read/write lock for write.

Lock the lock for write, allowing one writer exlusive access. If the lock is held for read or write, block waiting for its unlock. Locking the lock recursively from one thread, for read or write, can result in deadlock.
